item.title: FOREX-Squeeze on carry trades leaves currency markets on edge
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:
(Updates at 0306 GMT)
By Ankur Banerjee
SINGAPORE, Aug 6 (Reuters) - The U.S. dollar was nursing steep losses on Tuesday, with the yen on the back foot after a sharp rise in the previous session as traders contend with unwinding of popular carry trades and the prospect of deep rate cuts from the F...
